Title: Gimi FLNG heads to Tenerife as preparatory activities at Greater Tortue Ahmeyim still underway
Description: The 126,277 m3 Gimi floating LNG unit to be deployed at the BP-operated 2.4 mtpa Greater Tortue Ahmeyim floating LNG facility in Senegal and Mauritania is sailing towards the Canary Islands where it will moor offshore Tenerife until preparatory work at the project site is completed.
Author: CK

Title: Egypt posts largest LNG export decline globally in 2023 due to feed gas supply constraints
Description: A severe heatwave and the resultant increase in Egypt’s domestic gas consumption during the summer months, as well as reduced pipeline gas exports from Israel, took a heavy toll on feed gas receipts at Egypt’s LNG plants, resulting in a steep fall in their LNG shipments last year.
Author: CK
